basics.summary: In my career I have worked in both backend and frontend teams, which allowed me to develop knowledge across the stack and gain the ability to add value to engineering teams on multiple levels. I enjoy working in cross functional product teams, where I can independently drive initiatives and features.

work.summary: Software engineer for a greenfield project born to decommission an obsolete internal tool for fraud detection. Initially unique contributor for the frontend, helped to scale the team to 4 resources and lead it with a sprint based approach.

work.summary: Software engineer working alongside machine learning engineers to develop and deploy web services for NLP applications and deep learning models. I was responsible for technical interviews, mentored new hires and helped the team establish development best practices, continuous integration and continuous delivery.

Performed molecular phylogenetic analyses to support the discovery of a novel species of lichen. Specific tasks included: dna extraction and amplification of lichen samples, thin layer chromatography of lichen substances, morphological analysis of lichens, maximum likelihood and bayesian computational analyses of sequenced DNA.
